text: R. A. M. Golam Muktadir is a retired two star rank Bangladesh Army officer and former Director General of Bangladesh Rifles. ==Career== He was the Director General of Bangladesh Rifles from 1 July 1982 to 16 July 1985. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bangladesh Army generals Category:Director Generals of Border Guards Bangladesh Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: R. A. M. Golam Muktadir
